sentences: She conducts cognitive assessments for Alzheimer’s patients every morning.
She does not conduct cognitive assessments when the patient is fasting.
Does she conduct cognitive assessments before adjusting any medication?
Doesn't she conduct cognitive assessments when new memory issues arise?
Conduct a cognitive assessment now and record the score.
How thoroughly she conducts cognitive assessments during each visit!
She is conducting a cognitive assessment right now while the caregiver observes.
She is not conducting a cognitive assessment because the patient is too fatigued.
Is she conducting a cognitive assessment in the quiet room this afternoon?
Isn't she conducting a cognitive assessment even though the neurologist requested one?
Conduct a cognitive assessment immediately and note any confusion.
How gently she is conducting the cognitive assessment despite the patient's anxiety!
She has conducted cognitive assessments for dozens of Alzheimer’s patients this week.
She has not conducted cognitive assessments since the clinic’s power outage.
Has she conducted cognitive assessments using the updated MoCA protocol?
Hasn't she conducted cognitive assessments for the new admissions yet?
Conduct cognitive assessments quickly and update the charts.
How consistently she has conducted cognitive assessments across all age groups!
She has been conducting cognitive assessments all morning without a break.
She has not been conducting cognitive assessments because the testing materials are delayed.
Has she been conducting cognitive assessments while the family waits outside?
Hasn't she been conducting cognitive assessments throughout the screening day?
Conduct cognitive assessments promptly and hydrate between sessions.
How tirelessly she has been conducting cognitive assessments during the health fair!
She conducted a cognitive assessment yesterday just before the MRI scan.
She did not conduct a cognitive assessment last Friday due to a migraine.
Did she conduct a cognitive assessment after the medication review?
Didn't she conduct a cognitive assessment when memory lapses were reported?
Conduct a cognitive assessment today and share the results with the family.
How expertly she conducted the cognitive assessment despite the limited time!
She was conducting a cognitive assessment when the fire alarm interrupted.
She was not conducting a cognitive assessment that evening; she was counseling the caregiver.
Was she conducting a cognitive assessment at three o’clock as scheduled?
Wasn't she conducting a cognitive assessment when you called?
Conduct a cognitive assessment before noon and arrange follow-up tests.
How calmly she was conducting the cognitive assessment amid the noise!
She had conducted a cognitive assessment before the neurologist entered the room.
She had not conducted a cognitive assessment by the time the patient fell asleep.
Had she conducted a cognitive assessment on the new referral earlier that day?
Hadn't she conducted a cognitive assessment before prescribing medication?
Conduct a cognitive assessment before leaving and file the report.
How thoroughly she had conducted the cognitive assessment ahead of schedule!
She had been conducting cognitive assessments for hours when the test kit ran out.
She had not been conducting cognitive assessments because the consent forms were missing.
Had she been conducting cognitive assessments throughout the outreach clinic?
Hadn't she been conducting cognitive assessments until the power failed?
Conduct cognitive assessments by 5 p.m. and document any declines.
How persistently she had been conducting cognitive assessments despite the heat!
She will conduct a cognitive assessment tomorrow before starting therapy.
She will not conduct a cognitive assessment tonight if the patient is too agitated.
Will she conduct a cognitive assessment once the caffeine wears off?
Won't she conduct a cognitive assessment after the orientation session?
Conduct a cognitive assessment tomorrow and schedule a follow-up.
How confidently she will conduct a cognitive assessment with the new tools!
She will be conducting cognitive assessments at this time next Monday.
She will not be conducting cognitive assessments during the community workshop.
Will she be conducting cognitive assessments when the relatives arrive?
Won't she be conducting cognitive assessments while the residents shadow her?
Conduct cognitive assessments this week and compare the trends.
How smoothly she will be conducting cognitive assessments with the revised protocol!
She will have conducted cognitive assessments for all scheduled patients by Friday.
She will not have conducted cognitive assessments if the testing room stays closed.
Will she have conducted cognitive assessments before the grant review visit?
Won't she have conducted cognitive assessments by the time the new guidelines take effect?
Conduct cognitive assessments by Friday and submit the summary.
How perfectly she will have conducted cognitive assessments across the caseload!
She will have been conducting cognitive assessments for twelve hours by the end of the clinic day.
She will not have been conducting cognitive assessments all afternoon if the supplies run out.
Will she have been conducting cognitive assessments continuously until the dementia seminar starts?
Won't she have been conducting cognitive assessments for weeks when the clinical trial closes?
Conduct cognitive assessments as soon as possible and rest between sessions.
How steadfastly she will have been conducting cognitive assessments throughout the campaign!
korean: 그녀는 매 아침 알츠하이머 환자를 위해 인지 검사를 실시한다.
환자가 금식 중이면 그녀는 인지 검사를 실시하지 않는다.
약 조정 전에 그녀는 인지 검사를 실시하나요?
새로운 기억 장애가 나타나면 그녀는 인지 검사를 실시하지 않나요?
지금 인지 검사를 실시하고 점수를 기록하세요.
매 방문마다 그녀가 인지 검사를 얼마나 철저히 실시하는지!
그녀는 지금 보호자가 지켜보는 가운데 인지 검사를 실시하고 있다.

건강 박람회 내내 그녀가 인지 검사를 얼마나 지치지 않고 실시하고 있는지!
